testCases.summary: Verify filtering is enabled on all columns of the transaction list
testCases.preconditions: User is logged into the application and navigated to the transaction list page.

steps.step: Navigate to the transaction list page.
steps.expectedResult: Transaction list page is displayed with all columns visible.

steps.step: Attempt to apply a filter on each column of the transaction list.
steps.expectedResult: Filter options are available and can be applied to each column.

testCases.postconditions: Filters are applied to the transaction list.

testCases.summary: Verify sorting functionality works correctly with applied filters
testCases.preconditions: User has applied a filter on the transaction list.

steps.step: Apply a filter to a specific column in the transaction list.
steps.expectedResult: The transaction list is filtered based on the selected criteria.

steps.step: Sort the filtered transaction list by a different column.
steps.expectedResult: The transaction list is sorted based on the selected column, considering only the filtered results.

testCases.postconditions: The transaction list remains sorted and filtered as per the user's actions.

testCases.summary: Verify help guide is updated with filtering instructions
testCases.preconditions: User is on the transaction list page.

steps.step: Access the help guide from the transaction list page.
steps.expectedResult: Help guide is accessible and opens correctly.

steps.step: Review the help guide for instructions on using filters.
steps.expectedResult: Help guide contains updated instructions on how to apply and use filters on the transaction list.

testCases.postconditions: User understands how to use the filtering feature from the help guide.

testCases.summary: Verify transaction graph does not refresh based on chosen filters
testCases.preconditions: User has applied filters on the transaction list.

steps.step: Apply a filter to the transaction list.
steps.expectedResult: The transaction list is filtered based on the selected criteria.
The transaction graph remains unchanged and does not refresh based on the applied filters.

testCases.postconditions: The transaction graph remains static regardless of list filters.

testCases.summary: Verify Copilot does not recognize user-selected filters
testCases.preconditions: User has applied filters on the transaction list.

steps.step: Apply a filter to the transaction list.
steps.expectedResult: The transaction list is filtered based on the selected criteria.

steps.step: Ask a question to Copilot that would typically require filter awareness.
steps.expectedResult: Copilot provides a response without considering the applied filters.

testCases.postconditions: Copilot's response is independent of the transaction list filters.

assumptions: Test data should include a diverse set of transactions with varying attributes to effectively test filtering and sorting functionalities.
